Missing West Auckland man Dylan Barford: Police hunting for vehicle of interest https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-west-auckland-man-dylan-barford-police-hunting-for-vehicle-of-interest/UEOT7GAVLBANNB33CKH3SVQOVY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/missing-west-auckland-man-dylan-barford-police-hunting-for-vehicle-of-interest/UEOT7GAVLBANNB33CKH3SVQOVY/ The small silver hatchback was seen on camera the morning after he went missing. Mon, 09 Oct 2023 23:28:44 +0000 Police investigating the disappearance of Auckland man Dylan Barford want to speak to the driver and occupants of a vehicle of interest. The vehicle is a small silver hatchback (pictured), believed to be a Suzuki Swift, Nissan Tiida or similar. It was seen on various CCTV cameras across Auckland on the morning Dylan went missing, on September 24. Photo / Supplied
